title: Fort Necessity National Battlefield: Parks as Classrooms
body: Parks as Classrooms        Curriculum Materials Have your students learn about the French and Indian War or the National Road.  Lesson plans and teacher's guides are available for both themes. All Curriculum Materials   Featured Curricula    The French and Indian War: 1754-1763 Learn More     Field Trips Bring your students to Fort Necessity.  The park offers programs for children Pre-K through high school.  There is something for everyone. All Field Trips   Plan Your Field Trip    Plan Your Field Trip Learn More
